column4: I have used the upgrade option to bring my boxes to 8,04 LTS.  Since 9 is now out and mainstream, I am wondering if there will appear an "upgrade" button on the update tool as well, or if that is a separate update path.
Dopeghoti: so that would involve a CD install, rather than installing packages online with the update tool?
Enable upgrade [x]. Do upgrade [x]. Be upgraded [x]. Seems like a solid process, dont you think ?
I think the Do upgrade [x]. Should be included in the update gui though
